Reason: The 'periodic_commitlog_sync_lag_block_in_ms' configuration is performance-sensitive. This is because it directly impacts the system performance by potentially slowing down the write operations when the disk flushes are slow. The configuration involves time-expensive operations in the PeriodicCommitLogService class, where it calculates the expected sync time and waits for the sync to complete based on the configured block time. If the block time is too long, it can lead to increased latency in write operations, causing notable performance variations at the system level.
